As far as service is concerned, I have had good and bad, but I will say that it has been great the last 3 times that I was there, even when it was crazy busy.  Best time that I had at Duckworth's was when I went for a few late night drinks on a Saturday recently with the wife after going out to dinner somewhere else.  It was on the way home, so easy enough to pop in.  There were a few people watching some late night college football games, but for the most part it was a relaxed atmosphere and the service was great.

C6vdme0f3OOOePJtq3I1Ig.text: Fantastic service!  Excellent food. Never had anything bad here. Over 70+ beers on tap. How can you go wrong!

pJn_iYsGMdBZZanEz2iQbQ.text: When I lived in Ballantyne, I was 10 min away from this place. Now I'm in uptown, and I wish it still were 10 min away from me. There are so many awesome things to note about this place. Firstly, this is such a great place for sports fans. They have 40-odd TVs... Yep, you read that right, 40... Each one showing a different game so a great settlement for parties that have a variety of interests or when there are multiple games going on simultaneously. The service is pretty decent. One particular thing worth mentioning was how much the hostess was concerned about my meal when i ordered my steak medium-rare and it came out well done. She looked at it and said "oh yeah, that's definitely not medium-rare" and quickly had it taken away and brought another steak. Kudos! Also, I love their beer selection although I really dig their Strawberi Fruili (pardon me if I misspelled that) which is a strawberry beer. I always get their beer sampler because I think it's a very good value for money. As for food, here's my favorite part. They have the best home style chips I've ever tasted in the United States. I always get the sirloin steak because they just make it so perfect every time. They also have nice sides, the over roasted veggies and sweet potato fries being my favorite. My boyfriend is crazy about their Jalapeno Chicken. And the Seasoning Salt they have at the tables is a fantastic addition to everything, from the fries and roasted veggies, to steaks. Mmmm, writing about this is making me drool already. I think I'm off to get me some sirloin steak!

ecvDQpzb-5Wu87SSAfYvHw.text: Great place to watch a game, the loaded nachos are some of the best I had, I like the fajita chicken. Kid friendly and a nice menu. The food is bar kinda food so the my rating is comparing it to other bar type places. The beer selection is large with a ton of local and regional brews. Staff is friendly and the manager has always came by to say hi and check on my table and fix anything that needed to be fixed.

iPNTAExPs130IbpMc85GdQ.text: LOVE the beer selection!!! If you're looking for a great pub to have a few drinks and watch some sports, this is it!!! Amazing tap and bottle selection from micro breweries all over the country and world!!! I'm a complete beer snob, and was really impressed... Found some options that i've had trouble tracking down just about anywhere else. Quite impressed...  That being said, the service and food were flat out awful. Our server was completely lost the entire time. Brought us the wrong drinks, never brought us the waters we requested, came out with the wrong food and took forever to replace it, didn't know the menu and seemed completely lost... I would have imagined that a college kid on their first night would be more attentive and knowledgeable... To be fair, they were busy when we were there, but still, i would expect a lot more.  Food was terrible... Fried pickles looked like they had taken one of those economy jars of sliced pickle chips, dipped them in batter and fried them (NOT fried pickle spears). They were terrible and tasted like they had been made in a walmart parking lot... Wing appetizers i ordered were decent, but only because there was so much sauce it covered up the burnt taste of the overcooked wings... Wings were tough and tasteless (with the exception of the sauce, which was actually quite good). We also ordered nachos which  were pretty lousy, and a salad that came out with the piece of meat completely cold and uncooked in the middle.   All in all, unless you're planning on saddling up to the bar for a few drinks, i'd stay away... There's a mellow mushroom (i know, it's a chain, but much safer in this case) right across the street that has a similar drink menu, and significantly better food and service!!!

Fj0cDmO9Mvr8T1N23SWCmA.text: Stopped in for an early dinner Saturday. Me, the wife, and daughter. The food was good. Wings came out hot, and I asked for extra crispy/well done and they were. Wife's buffalo wrap was a bit too spicy for her, but they switched it right away no issues. The thing that really stood out was the manager. I think his name was Matt. He stopped by and apologized and went out of his way to make sure we were happy. His attitude was beyond what you would expect and was really nice. He alone would is the reason we will go back. I would give 5 stars but the price for some wings, beer, and sandwiches seems a bit high.

2kWzpB33fBTgo-r_kiFvVw.text: Despite a ton of unbussed, dirty tables we were given a decent sized wait. When we pointed to a empty table we finally told the truth that they were understaffed. We then say at the bar for 10 and no one came over to ask if we wanted something. Love their other locations, likely poor management at this one.

vocevPqPN7C5JnWnpon57w.text: Pretty standard sports bar. Good layout, with plenty of HDTV seats. Beer selection is expansive. Feature beer night I went was watermelon. I tried it... Yech! Why even put it on the menu?  I only ordered the french fries, which were good.

UIeIU8wKX2qjhNi9fg2IqQ.text: I eat here often and the food is always great.  But I expect that anywhere.  The service is usually good.....but, tonight we had a bit of a delay and a misstep.  When the mgr realized we'd been sitting a few minutes he came right over....took out order and had the waitress bring out an appetizer we hadn't even ordered.  It isn't about something what goes wrong, it's about how you fix it.  Nice job.  Really like this place and the food.

I3ZVBti2wRMs-E4frwrZAQ.text: Walked in after church on a Sunday here for some good brunch. Walked out feeling full & happy with the burger and fries I had. Great place!

sDl40PCWVkzs61PZJ3gLxw.text: Duckworth's is the best bar in Ballantyne. Lots of TV, lots of beer, lots of menu items...lots of everything you would want in a sports bar. I highly recommend to anyone looking for an affordable, fun place to have dinner!

msUFt7a6rvXvHl6VKzH5_g.text: I love this place for the RIBS!!! They have the absolute best ribs ever and you can get a full rack (feeds 2) for $20 with sides! The wings are good also, but the ribs are top notch!! The only side I like is the fries (regular or sweet potato). The rest of the sides are mediocre at best. Overall, a great place with a nice atmosphere...especially if you like to watch sports!

pg9sQXBDBoTyX0tH7K1IqQ.text: Cheesesteaks were 1 of the closest things I could find in the Charlotte area. Nothing beats an authentic Philly & this 1 didn't disappoint. (No amorosa rolls), but cmon, it isn't Philly. If you're looking for a fix, I would definitely recommend. Not to mention over 70 beers on tap. Waitresses was friendly & recommended some good stouts.

hVuzgwDrh753YeDaIOQQcg.text: Our first experience at Duckworth's was terrible. It was a  Wednesday night and the hostess quoted my significant other and I a 45 minute wait. That was okay with us so we headed to the bar to grab a drink while we waited for a table. As we were standing in the bar we noticed several tables were empty but needed to be bussed. I watched at lease a dozen servers walk by these tables without clearing one thing from them. After waiting almost an hour for a table and noticing new customers walking into the restaurant being seated immediately we went to the hostess stand to check on our table. Turns out they had crossed our name off the list like we had already been seated.   After the hostess cleaned one of the tables we were finally seated. For an appetizer we ordered the mozzarella sticks. They were pretty good and came out relatively quickly. Our entrees took at least 45 minutes to come out. Please note by this time it was close to 8:30pm and the restaurant was beginning to clear out. Both of our food came out cold. I ordered the 1/2 rack of ribs and the baked beans. I did enjoy my ribs (besides the fact they were cold) but the beans were terrible. My significant other ordered the buffalo chicken wrap with fries which were nothing special. Mean I to add that my significant other had to ask for ranch dressing 3 different times before actually receiving it! 1) when she placed her order 2) to the server who delivered the food 3) the another sever when it still had not come.   Overall, our food was cold, the wait and ticket times were ridiculous, and the staff was inattentive. If it wasn't for their over the top beer selection we would not have a reason to come back.

mBXeeQV4M7qFdavKLB_fUQ.text: We went on Saturday and they tried to sit us in the very back corner, beside the bathrooms, tucked in with 3 or 4 tables with kids. It looked like Chuck E Cheeses. No.   Then they tried to make us sit at a high top in the bar.  There were empty tables and booths all over, but the only available seats were in the kid's section, or at a high top?  I don't think so. We went to the new Indian place in the shopping center, and were very happy.

uJ5QkbdLtkZoPiGWKhGC6w.text: This place has a great vibe and an amazing beer and drink selection. I have been to this location and a few others in the last few years and it never disappoints. They make a killer Philly cheesesteak! Also, get the wings! I prefer boneless. Get the mommoo and the sweet n bold gold flavors!

-AOFvRlqqE7iPnCVW1rbOw.text: Amazing, one of my top favorite places in Charlotte.  Lemon Pepper Wings, omg!   Garlic fries....etc.....

vWF8BI8r1oT8EUQer-BNEQ.text: I came here thinking I'd give it a show as someone had told me it was pretty good. I should have known better considering I'm not overly fond of chain restaurants. There are some good ones out there and I thought maybe this could be a good one to catch the football games at on occasion come August. Yeah not even close.  They have a multitude of televisions but they are all small. Not a single large screen tv in the place and that was disappointing. The wait staff was not on their A game and it took us forever to get our order in and to get our check at the end of the meal.   I ordered the chicken pesto sandwich with sweet potato fries. The pesto tasted like it came from one of those packets you get at the grocery store. It was very runny and mediocre. The fries tasted good but they were swimming in butter. I know I asked for them sweet (you get a choice of sweet or salty), but I wasn't expecting there to be butter pooling on my plate from them... gross!!!  My mom got a bacon cheeseburger and while the bacon was plentiful (as in way too much.. I know what am I saying right) it was well under cooked. She had to pick 90% of it off and by the time she was done there was a pile of bacon on her plate sky high.  Their beer selection seems to be a good one and although I didn't have any they had a lot of local choices as well as the usual. So I give them an extra star purely for the beer list. Overall I will not be back here!!

IGzN35buUk_zwLWc83zSoA.text: Came in on a Monday night with a friend to watch some football. The baseball games were on and most of the televisions in the bar area were turned to that - which was fine. It was loud and we could not ignore when the Red Sox would make some sort of play.   I had wine, he had beer, and we split the fried pickles.   Good selections on beer and the wine was pretty good with a generous pour. The fried pickles came fresh from the fryer and the portion size was appropriate.   Our server was pretty good and checked on us quite often.   If I'm in the Ballantyne area, this is a nice, casual spot to have a drink and watch a sporting event.

9u7ezb7b8JDi7qQHNpGcrg.text: Good value, Good food.  Clean.  Wait Staff courteous and helpful. We ordered cheese steaks and they were topnotch. Beer selections are multitudinous. Definitely a great place for lunch or dinner. Thoroughly enjoyed our visit and will return.

zet73vMshMkxksQAPAPZMQ.text: Great food and great service! Far exceeded my expectations and love that they have outdoor seating! The onion rings were the best!

KDLCsXnL4sganlKszML_DA.text: Food is really good! But it takes forever to get the food :( ...   It was really crowded, and we waited 40 min for a table... Auch.

YSj1dseUl5ig0rLH-BlasQ.text: GREAT place to watch games!!! SO MANY TVS!!   The food is good as well, they are very accommodating and have a great selection of beers.

oL7JT3kOfp2h-RnRZu4FOw.text: I would rename this place safe haven after being harassed by other customers at the Blue Olive lounge my friend and I,  out on a girls night we're looking for shelter from what seem to be a drunken storm. We were so well taken care of at Duckworth's and their pizza was one of the best I have ever eaten I will be going back and I will be bringing more of my friends

GWw9QWl298zYtCrKdAZ06g.text: Usually pretty busy, but the service is always great. Good selection on tap. Definitely one of my favorite late night spots, that never disappoints.

ZrrrKu1szv5njAh1ULVsjw.text: Had to find an employee in the bar to be seated because no one was at the front. I ordered the boneless wings with the sweet and bold sauce. The sauce must have had a lot of vinegar in it because the fumes were making me cough and my eyes water. I ate one and it instantly gave me serious heart burn. I sent them back and got a Teriyaki sauce. SAME THING. My boyfriend ordered the Philly and the meat looked like it was fake. He wasn't pleased with it at all. They have a good beer selection but unfortunately the beers we ordered were flat. Must say out of all of this our server was awesome. Will not be coming back.

Eu_6pXnuQIt8K6c5I9APGA.text: Worst dining experience ever. The server never put our order in and we have waited over an hour for our food. When it finally arrived it was wrong and the staff seemed upset with us for being disappointed. Never coming back.

ufUn9J-2b6eBOvaPfthV7w.text: Awesome experience! Our waiter (John) was extremely friendly and attentive, but not over bearing. He was knowledgeable and suggested some delicious beers/blended beers. The manager (Dan) came by and was also extremely friendly and gave us some complementary samples of limited time beers. The food was amazing! We had fried pickles and the Buffalo chicken pizza and both were to die for. The atmosphere was awesome, free wifi, not much more you could ask for...oh except for maybe a selection of 80 beers on tap! This was my first time at Duckworths but certainly will not be my last.

ajv-SG1Hkg4iTHLkT7zSSQ.text: For the good..  The staff is very nice and the beer list is excellent.  Our server was working her first shift but she was supported by additional team members so it was not noticeable.   For the bad...  Of the 3 items we had 2 were of poor quality.    The first issue is with the mozzarella sticks.  The kitchen seems to think dried basil/oregano is an appropriate garnish.  It's not.  Dried spices should not be used as a garnish.  Fresh basil/oregano would have been great.  Beyond this, you don't need 2 tablespoons of garnish for such a small dish.  The second issue came with our chicken wings.  It was obvious that these were overcooked and sat under a heat lamp.  My thinking is the wings needed to wait for the veggie burger to be ready and paid the price.  FWIW, the veggie burger was great.    All in all, this is a very promising place with a great front staff.  I hope it was simply the kitchen having an off night.  We will be going back and I hope to upgrade the review here as there is a lot of potential for this to be a good spot in my book.

LXmZIM_M4yNz9IzW0VbrjQ.text: Been a Duckworths patron for many years but unfortunately the wings have gone down hill. I was told by a manager that they have changed wing suppliers. They are now short fatty wings that distorts the flavor. I am getting soft on one my favorite and highly recommended places to eat. Please go back to the old supplier.

JI4MRMM8WxjLjXuiWKRmlw.text: My coworker and I were in Charlotte for training and afterwards went here for lunch. The food was delicious, and the service was great!  I had the Cobb salad and my friend had the buffalo chicken wrap. Kaitlin was our server and she was very friendly. I highly recommend Duckworth's!

kA0J3A0FO6zwinZCXdnDHg.text: We love this place. The atmosphere, the service, and most importantly the food. The philly is ALWAYS money. I had the tater skins for the app, really good.   We enjoyed having Katlyn as our server. She was very vibrant and attentive.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States

L10MSf3JmiRRBJ9w6OKHvA.text: This is our second time to Duckworths and really I'd give this visit 3.5 stars because the service was just sooooo slow (2/5).  But the small supreme pizza was very good.  Again though the wait, and keep in mind that small 10 inch pizza was all we ordered but it took a good 35-40 minutes, yes,  no joke, can I getta WTF??  But the waitress was fine albeit she was not as present as we'd would have expected with drinks either.  Heck she may have forgot about us .   Seriously,  at one point we decided to leave, which I never generally consider.  I didn't take a pic of the pizza because at that point I honestly forgot so just an interior shot.  The pizza was good though, but probably not worth the wait.  Also, it really gets loud in the restaurant and the overall layout of the tables seems random and odd (2/5).  But we would still go back for the pizza and give them another shot with the service.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. Interior

rWPllX_juDtTyNnoaxDO3g.text: Had a great experience.  Enjoyed the food and had a great time with friends.  The manager came by and asked how we were enjoying our meal.  Great atmosphere, will defiantly be back.

5PigZaL1NCwCnRWFv_6yUQ.text: Long time customer at DGT.  Food and beer are still A-1 and I will continue to visit.  Bartending has steadily declined over last few months.  Used to be that you never had to flag someone for a refill.  Nowadays not so much.  So many times the bartenders are just handling the housekeeping and ignoring the empty glasses.  Eye contact?  Some are very good, some are very bad.  I should say that I rarely had a bad server when seating at a table, but on occasion inexperience does show.  Managers do periodically stop by and ask how everything was, but this appears to be perfunctory.  Instead of asking how everything was, how about 'how can we do better'?  I am not sure if you will get any better feedback, because most of us don't want to complain face-to-face.  Rather we hide behind the anonymity of these reviews.  Restrooms also tend to get ignored most nights.  Some improvement here - please?

Ss5gr7I1rTiqo94y6aokXQ.text: Up until today, Kerr's Wings in Clearwater, Florida were my favorite for nearly 20 years. No more. The king is dead. Long live the king!  Duckworth's wings (grilled after deep frying) with chunky Mommoo Sauce  are the best wings I've ever had!  When we moved to the area I asked a neighbor where we could get some great wings. She recommended Duckworths, stressing the Mommoo Sauce HAD to be chunky. Man, she was spot on!  Great service! Clean! A zillion wide-screen TV'S! And who could complain about IPads left at your table to sort through their 70+ beer selections?  Arrive hungry. Be prepared to be impressed!  Highly recommended!

UVtbbbvYtSnhiijhWgZJnA.text: Really great service here! This was our first visit and our server, mike, was very friendly and personable! He asked about our beer choices and how we liked them, and also made sure we had everything we needed throughout our time here. Lots of good choices of beer on tap! Will definitely be visiting this location in the future.

yplDwx7Rkq5gs67-l53T4g.text: In the hour we've been sitting here, I've watched a bartender stick his finger in a customer's shot before a waiter took it to the table; bartender take half shots of whatever drink he made for customers, and casually stick his fingers under the rim of someone's glass to pull something out before serving... Also just a heads up the wings dont come with celery unless you ask for it.  They serve celery with wings "by request" only to help keep the cost of the wings down ..K.

4dEgJFGG4jOlTerLRWy5hQ.text: Came here on a date. Checked in right away, they took our name and number to text us when a table opened up. They said 25 mins. 40 minutes later, my husband went to ask how much longer it would be--we had a babysitter and didn't have a lot of time. The hostess looked at the list of names and found ours--they had skipped it. She didn't apologize, just said "We can seat you right now." And took us to a table. She said "someone will be with you shortly" and took off. Looking around, there were a ton of open tables, so there was no reason why we were left waiting.   We ordered within 5 minutes. Got our appetizer promptly--fried pickles, they were good. Our waitress was nice. Then we waited 35 minutes for a burger and a flatbread. The burger was very small and the flatbread had very little toppings on it.   Super disappointed in this place as we had been before and had a great experience. It took way took long to be seated because we were forgotten, and then took forever to get our disappointing food.   Won't be back.

UsulDU-7RuoS01Wqfxnhyw.text: This is fantastic location with ample menu selection offerings for both food and beverages. Basically, if you leave here hungry, it's your own fault.    The buffalo chicken wrap is excellent, particularly when paired with the sweet potato fries. Try the cinnamon sweet potato fries, they're delectable.

DmnA9XMNAu5pRuUXJKQGug.text: You had me at half off wine bottles on Friday!    Duckworth's never disappoints and our service was amazing.  Emma is an excellent server.  We were in a rush and she made sure we had everything we needed quickly.  I highly recommend the loaded buffalo chicken nachos.  It is more than enough for two people and the portion is huge.  These are the best nachos in charlotte.  How many times have you gotten halfway through nachos and you run out of toppings???  At Duckworth's the topping/chip portion is perfection.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. 1/2 off wine bottles
Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. Loaded buffalo chicken nachos

lOV_d24kmHFmfnS4T0JOig.text: There seems to be a Sports Bar on every corner now and I typically don't patronize them, simply  because I cannot consume alcohol.  I don't think of them as first choices for lunch options, but today I needed to take my mom to lunch and didn't have a lot of time to look for restaurants. We were right next to Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse, so we stuck our heads in the door and landed in a booth.  Giant menu with a lot of options.  We were initially going to splurge on some chicken wings, but both opted for a summer salad.  The salad came with cranberries and strawberries and mandarins and a lot of good things, including blue cheese crumbles. When the food came out, my mother asked if they had any crackers.  The answer was no. So, I asked if they had any bread. The answer was that they had garlic bread but that it would cost us more money.   The lady who brought our food was abrupt and not customer centric.  When our server came, I mentioned that my salad was supposed to have blue cheese crumbles, but didn't.  She apologized, but I said it was no big deal.  I asked her for bread without garlic and she was happy to get us some.   Before we knew it, the area manager, Kevin, was at our table apologizing.  He ended up talking with us for a long period of time. He went to get blue cheese crumbles for me and rushed our bread along.  He was extremely pleasant and when we finished, my Mom resolved that she would need to return to Duckworths. It just goes to prove, once again, that a little customer service goes a long way.  (The lady who delivered our food needs some additional training in  customer service.)   Still not a Sports Bar fan, but as it goes, this was a pretty good one!   And I will always ask for Kevin, if and when I am back in there!

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States

spsqbfr-Jyi3EG1zI00UzQ.text: We've eaten here a couple of times and love it. Staff is very friendly, place is clean, food is delicious. Everything was cooked pretty quickly and made just how we wanted. We will definitely be back.

9WLuJK-A4px80tcrne6lbA.text: This place has gone downhill. Very disappointed.  From the start there was bad service.  The older(with glasses) hostess greeted us without a smile.  Then right after she asked us to follow her to the table she took a phone call and we waited several minutes.  Once seated, the really bad service begun.  Our waitress (overly made up with teal eyeliner and a sour face) was unfriendly, never smiled, seemed annoyed to help us, and got a bit snarky when asking questions about the flights of beer.  We specifically came in for flights and to try the "impossible burger" which they we put of.  We chose our flights, had a couple of other apps and the service just seemed to deteriorate from there.  All the TV's went down due to weather (satellite) and as a sports bar they should have contingency's I was extremely disappointed in the overall service.  Will not come back or recommend.

6TjYKHatY-YYb_ZxtsSLHw.text: Had a better experience here than last time. Came here last minute with the hubs for a late dinner. We got sat right away at a booth. Our server was friendly and thoughtful. We started off with the hot buffalo wings. They were good and hot but a little skimpy on the sauce. We asked for extra sauce and dumped it on the wings and they were much better. I got the philly cheesesteak supreme sandwich and tater tots. I was pretty pleased with my meal. The tots were crispy and the sandwich was good and cheesy. My husband got a large pizza with half pepperoni and half canadian bacon. Overall, it was pretty good but my husband likes half and half toppings and he didn't like that they charged for each topping even though it was half and half. Besides that we had a good experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. Philly supreme with tots
Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. Half pep half Canadian bacon
Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. hot wings-hardly any sauce

YeK4QF7DZh10VL3frgO_HQ.text: The food here is gross. I ordered a burger just to be safe and it was two very thin smushed patties. The onion rings were hot and soggy. Would not come back when there are plenty of other places around the area to get a burger.

XC4MwEHY6zhMmHMP_t2eXA.text: The beer selection here is huge but i still find myself looking for a beer i want to drink. They use ipads for beer menus, which dont always work. The food menu is also huge, which makes me wonder what they are really good at. Ive had a few meals here and none of them have been bad, but nothing really drives me back here to eat. The service is always hit and miss. Ive waited for 10 minutes at the door just to be greeted, had to ask multiple times for a check or another beer, etc. Other times, the service has been very attentive and all I could ask for. Consistency helps. Ill be back because they are close by, have NFL games, and I like bar food and beers, but my expectations will always be tempered.

j2DpP15jsRJxvam8qOCctg.text: I was disappointed after i posted a good review 2 weeks ago about how good and nice Crystal was.  Went to this restaurant 3 days ago, i was on the table for more than 15 minutes no one came and offer anything. Waitress kept passing through didn't even look at me like I didn't exist. Some customers came after me and they were being served with drinks and took their orders. So I decided to left the restaurant. The lady who helped me to get the table ask what happen and i told her I'm leaving. She was shocked that nobody help me at all.  I love this place because it's convenient for me since i work around the area but i am not going back here.   Gemma

r8d0iK1IAwV5dqljooI9WQ.text: Took forever to get waited on. I got a drink with about 3 ice cubes. Ordered water with lemon and got water with 3 pieces of ice and no lemon. Amazing how servers walk by and don't even acknowledge you. Food is always good but service needs a lot of work.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. Guess they are running low on ice? I asked for ice water with lemon. I get water with 3 pieces of ice and no lemon

0ONeAqv8iZ4ORiUODuIFFA.text: Asked two different members of the wait staff to turn CC on one of the TV's and was told it cannot be done. So I asked what they would do in the event they had a deaf customer, and the response was "well, you'd be shit out of luck". I'd rate zero stars, but it's not an option.

PE047ROk8naoHZsJNe6VhQ.text: Pretty standard Taphouse. I stopped in with my family for a quick bite. I got the chix philly, the rest of my party indulged in a slab of ribs, steak philly and wings. Again pretty standard food. Really not much more to add... The place won't "wow" you, but it's a solid American dining experience.   The 4th star is because they carry the hubs favorite beer Nitro.

ISLdm4lVxmFushhlGW6jUA.text: If you want good food.. look elsewhere. I ordered a burger and i didn't even finish it. Pizza tasted like it was a frozen pizza. And strawberry dessert cake looked better on the menu. But!!! If you want to go have good beer then it's worth the Trip! lots of variety and good options for beer only.

VGB397FoOO9saKJjNo4YUg.text: I do enjoy Duckworth's in Ballantyne. It's much bigger than the Montford one, parking is easier, get's the same kind of crowds too. My only thing in general is I'm not always a fan of their selections of beer. I love the wings! Always made exactly how I like them. Service at the bar is great! Love that they are open until 2a.m. (especially when having those late nite cravings). The draft specials are great- Mon. & Wed. $3.50 so this is the time to go. Weather changing it up to try new beers or just keepin it to the same fave & have more than one.

3b7BR4KPHk7cSgh39BKN8Q.text: Our 4-year old son LOVES their pizza!!! (Loves it)! We like that it's truly family friendly and a dependable, decent place in the neighborhood. Don't forget it's a big gathering place for football days and if you bring the kiddos, expect them to hear some profanities - lots of screamers the last time we watched another table get all bent out of shape about it - football = screaming. Just know that and you're all good!

UgussMgnWe3QHXLnE0ZiIQ.text: Always good and always quick and easy! The bartender Cam is the man and always makes sure everything is fresh and on time with no crazy waits! Good day or night!

KlN3c_9zGPfg-mGcISXjXw.text: Great restaurant! The staff was very friendly and the service was excellent...Our waitress was attentive and took the time to interact with my grandson. The food was great!  I have no complaints and will return real soon!

61DY0dXkoZRkfGyZC0QG0g.text: Lots of beer available, yes, but the selection appears to be all the crap beers, but thats just an opinion.  14oz pour at above what everyone else in the area charges for a 16oz is horrible, they have also selected a few that are 11.5 oz pours (and I'm not referring to the high gravity stuff, its just random) So the little 14oz glass comes out and its filled 1.5" short, basically making it something in the 11/12 oz pour area.  Cant imagine them making it to long playing these games when you can go 2 minutes away and get a 20oz pour for at least $1 less.  Food- got the philly, it wasn't bad, the large is $14.00 for a 10" roll a bit more meat than subway but damn, i could get 3 from Subway, not impressed.  Service- very slow, dont think it was all the waiters fault as it appeared he had 99 tables and the waitress had 1. The manager stopped by the table for a second and said "I'm glad your getting exceptional service and walked away" its obvious that his attitude towards service has rubbed off on his employees.   There are way to many GOOD restaurants out there to really play this game, I may go back, probably once hell freezes over.

qvXflOAmu2BECRDeanrvIQ.text: We came here with several friends on a business trip.  The fried pickles were ok, the wings were nothing special,  and my friend hated her bbq pork sandwich and said it was terrible.  I had the Island Fiesta Tilapia which was eh, and my other friend had the Baja Fish tacos.  I'm not sure why I kept ordering fish in NC thinking it would be good.  The fruity girly drinks were terrible.

qmsFshvfY_7vVNtouKWuQQ.text: Hard to beat their tap list. Nachos were off the chain. Service was truly outstanding. Server was at the table constantly checking in, the manager came by as well as another manager. A+ experience (and this was just for lunch). Will return!

dfsaCch5be1j-TZ-2HsjwA.text: I went with a couple of co-workers to grab a bite at lunch today.  The food was ok but our service left a lot to be desired on this visit.  I tried the fish tacos today. They were not the best fish tacos I have have ever eaten, but they were ok. The tacos were served with a side of chips and a pineapple-mango salsa.

4fejfOIRtNHIwapBz43vAg.text: Used to be much better. Their prices have gone up and the food has become pedestrian. (Trust the reviews that mention the food isn't very good.) They are trying to bank on being a nicer sports bar, but to do that, you have to have good food.  Still, it's not a bad sports bar as sports bars go, just nothing out of the ordinary. The saving grace of Duckworths is the selection on tap; it's excellent.

YnEYLNIgTfCgG5L7Ubmu7g.text: One of our go to places, we eat here once a week, is now off the list. After waiting over 10 minutes for service, even with an empty restaurant, our family of 5 will never return to eat here. Completely unacceptable......

beZJeMnynm2Ohj9vToOswQ.text: Was hoping I'd get one more 1st review, but somebody barely beat me to it.  This place opened lat Tuesday and I've been 3 times already.  First all I just need to say what a great location, layout, and selection of beers.  This place found a niche in that area that needed to be filled, with Mellow Mushroom coming down the street I'm thinking Ballentyne will be a new beer hub for the Charlotte area.  So many great beers, its not really worth even naming them, a wall of taps worthy of being dubbed "a flying saucer".  They even have $3 daily pint specials.  The food, well I've only had it once, and it was pretty good.  Much better than what you think of when ordering bar food.  They have your basic sandwhiches, soups, and salads, but many entrees and lunch specials as well.  My chicken sandwich was good, but my sweet potato fries were cold.  All-in-all I think this will be my new spot when in the area, great beer at somewhat reasonable prices.

H6wJ1GfDaIt_CrC2jMt65w.text: Very good experience tonight!!!! First off, we got there and was told that we would have a 45 minute wait and it actually ended up being only 10 minutes. Secondly, the food was absolutely delicious... I had the Philly Cheesesteak with garlic fries and for dessert the Cinnamon Sugar Donut Holes... Everything was to die for!!! Sever was nice and kept coming by to check on us... Just a fantastic experience overall!!!!

wBdxQntpAmlZ2mewNyMgJQ.text: This place is awesome! Great beer, great food, great service! Monday and Wednesday all drafts are 3.50 and on Wednesdays they have 9.99 pepperoni pizza. Pretty good specials

MgH66SGZPuhwHuV9qeraKg.text: This place is a beer drinker's delight. Especially on Monday and Wednesday, and be sure to joint their Beer Club, playing for each beer as you go in order to maximize rewards. The beer is kept in very good condition, and there is a large variety of beers. Each is serve as befitting its style; pils in a frozen glass, porters not.  Food service can be slow at time but the for a beer and sport bar the quality is A-OK and the variety on the menu never disappoints. The burgers, buffalo-blue cheese chips and garlic fries are awesome (see it is bar food).  The staff are friendly and eager to please and most are either knowledgeable about their beer and food, or are very willing to get you a member of staff  who is knowledgeable about the beer and food.  The sound system is great for watching a game and the place rocks when the Panthers on are and during college sports, but otherwise the music is played a tad too loud for goo conversations.

5HIV5lrlcdcSe5dAm2gcSg.text: Great bar food here. They are very accommodating and you are never rushed. Wifi is also available.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. Great seating so you can see anyplace.
Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. So many TV screens to watch:)

E3PHtQY4gX3qXZZMZqjtbg.text: Nina was our server (good service btw). My wife and I had the Applewood Bacon cheese burger. She had the sweet potato fries w/ cinnamon and sugar added (she raved about it). I had the regular fries and added malt vinegar which was perfect for me. Kids had chic quesadillas, pizza, Philly chz... loved it. The best was  philly. Ma-in-law had the Philly which she thought was delisious. Great atmosphere and a booth fit all 7 of us with only a 10 minute wait on a Friday night. Love love loved it.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. Duckworths in Charlotte NC

_eGEsrtHMtLVyd9JD9YvOQ.text: Not impressed!! The service was extremely slow for an order of nachos, 10 wings, and two kid meals. Our wings and kid order were messed up. We ordered two beers at a time and it took 10 minutes for the drinks to meet our table. First impressions go a mile- my family and I will definitely not be back.

KhW8BugHBENC76-HADWGcQ.text: First impressions: great location, friendly staff as we walked in, inviting atmosphere. Sports bar tastefully done.  Our hostess seated us in a booth and we told her it was our first time there. She told us the specials and what Duckworth's is famous for (boneless chicken wings). She was very friendly and outgoing.  Our server comes by and takes our order a bit later. Nothing spectacular about the service he offered us. He did his job but seemed to lack some enthusiasm (the hostess spoiled us haha). Order was taken and it we received our appetizers and orders in a timely manner. No real complaints, as everything was served properly. However, he should have come by and asked if everything was okay since "they" knew it was our first time here.  Food was excellent, and there was a wide variety of beers to be had. When asked for suggestions for local breweries on the menu, I was greeted with a blank stare. Woops...  Overall not a bad experience, but this seems to be the kind of restaurant more used to catering to people who don't need much help finding their way around the menu. I would give it 3.5 stars instead of 4 just for those reasons, but certainly deserves better than a 3. We would return again, and try something else on the menu.  PS...try their cheese cake!

p-FjvZh8qjZdSb2_MNvm_g.text: Decent beer selection but slow slow service!  Accidentally spilled my beer , they left the sloppy rag on the table and never picked it up. Left all the menus too and it was already a crowded table. Nothing food wise overnight impressive.. but I got some great beer and that's a plus

8D0ijY4XOM_IdkSHB7Lm7A.text: BALLANTYNE, CHARLOTTE, NC 06/19/19 DINNER  +The mega-sized nachos are a must order. +The wings are great. +This grill and taphouse spot is fairly lively and the wait staff seemed pretty attentive.  It's a nice sports bar with lots of junk food offerings.  I definitely need to return to try their award-winning Philly Cheesesteak.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States

BZiKAaSGvtHj21dwN6XMHg.text: I went with my team after work one day. The area has been having problems with the power going out, so they weren't able to serve food right when we got there, which was understandable. This location has an incredible beer selection, and an impressive number of sours, which is pretty rare for any bar & grill! I'm not a big beer drinker and I had trouble choosing because of all the options. We ordered some appetizers, the tater tots weren't very good but the chicken fajita nachos made up for it. Again, this could've been due to the power issues. I definitely would go here again if only for the amazing beer selection!

DskPKr9HTXL-9NbUdK69oQ.text: Great environment waitstaff are friendly, great food roomy great temperature first time definitely will be back to drink and eat

vOuSVgNUqTGOqoAfX4wJtQ.text: Absolutely my favorite meal I have had on this vacation. We have been traveling from Florida up to DC and Maryland and back down again.   To start we got the Pitiki Punches. They were pretty good, but I wish I would have just gotten a soda. It was probably more that it was only 1pm and I normally don't drink that early, but it looked good so I tried it. It's definitely got more spice in it than I anticipated.   For our meal we split both a BBQ Chicken & Jalapeno Bacon Flat Bread and a Philly Cheesesteak Supreme with white American. DELICIOUS!!!!! I also got a side of just the garlic bread because in the pictures online it looked good. I was not disappointed. It had a great crunch to the bread, but wasn't so hard that you cut your gums up.  If I lived around here I would definitely be a regular at this place.

fJL2NElLSTOTjv_FElPdCA.text: My wife and I came in for a Sunday evening dinner.  I came for the Manhattan, which is good/decent given the local, and my wife and I come excitedly for the fried banana pepper rings.  My Manhattan came out timely and good however the banana pepper rings never showed.  Our entrees, very common and could be found anywhere, showed but not banana pepper rings.  We were asked if we still wanted them and we said "no".  Our entrees were on the table and we were beyond apps at this point .  The disappointment was no apologies, no managers came to visit the table, nothing other than we weren't charged for the food we didn't receive.  #blessed...I guess

eyQkxfxdkz_8H7Qu0Aghkw.text: The only thing bigger than the nachos here is the beer selection - they are both HUGE!!    I have been here multiple times, and visited the one uptown.  Duckworth's does not try and give you a gourmet meal - instead they provide some good bar food to go along with an extensive list of beer so you can enjoy sports and friends.    The Ballantyne location seems to be more consistent with service, but both places offer the same food.  Our last visit I had a Philly Cheesesteak and my wife ordered the special hot chicken sandwich (Nashville hot?) that had a chili rub on it.  My cheesesteak was fine - nothing I will order again, but the chicken sandwich was really good.  Lots of heat and flavor.  The fries and chips were good as well.  A good place to grab lunch, enjoy the game, or stop for happy hour!

FQI_h6Lam5e-wqgUq5XeyA.text: My aunt recommended this place and I'm glad she did. First we were impressed by the craft cocktails and diverse beer list. Drinks were much better than we anticipated....as good as I would expect in a hip, upscale restaurant. We only had apps but the wings, loaded fries and chips and queso were BOMB!!! The staff was attentive and the food came quick. The prices were great and so is the location. Will absolutely visit again.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States

-wxjBGNm8oPNknvBfrT7Sw.text: Great dinner selections had a chicken Caesar wrap it was very good. Service was great and will be returning

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chicken Caesar wrap

hLy3pbKMyWZFxVj81TKy0A.text: This is a great place. The environment is nice, its open and spacious, the wait staff is very nice. There are a lot of TV's as well, good for watching sports. They also have good food. There wings are really good among other food. Its cool that you can request either all drums or all legs. I would suggest trying out this place. I'll definitely be going again.

xfBZPbK9tCxABXJKsoUQ9A.text: Muy buena la atencion  , Jami was a excellent waiters very nice and humble, she is a new on this job but she is doing great , the food was great and tasted

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States

xuB5Tu6jHf9_q0gq9jqgVQ.text: We ate here with our friends who highly recommended this place for dinner. Our hostess and waiter were wonderful but somehow this night was different. Our orders were 3 side salads two orders of chicken flatbreads, one chicken sandwich with a baked potato, sweet. potato fries and a cobb salad, plus wine. We waited at least half an hour before 2 side salads came out, then another 10 minutes before the 3rd side salad came out. Finally  almost 10 minutes  later (  almost 45 minutes since we initially ordered ) our main orders came out- they were not hot, barely warm. Lukewarm fries, cold baked potato etc. Finally after talking to the manager a second time , our orders were quickly  replaced and came out  hot as they should be. We were only charged for the wine we ordered . My friends were embarrased as they knew I yelped and wanted to impress me. Perhaps this was an off night for the restaurant. The food we ate was tasty, plated nicely, good portions, priced reasonable,  but came late and came cold. The menu features a  wide variety of choices, from salads, appetizers, burgers, sandwiches, flatbreads , bbq,  a wide variety of sides , great list of Taps and some great sounding desserts. The menu  also features hand cut fries, and award winning wings. There is something for everybody here. We will return but hope for a better dining experience next time.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. cobb salad
Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. chicken sandwich with side of baked potato
Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. chicken flatbread

1eHE2DXE-VwXJenkMPYGZA.text: We are visiting the area and decided to have dinner here. Service was friendly and prompt. The beer list is quite extensive. I do love that the list is presented on an iPad and you can click on any beer and get a full description. The meals were all tasty. The side salad was really very good and the ranch dressing was amazing. The pulled pork was excellent. My son (18 yo) got the sweet potato fries prepared sweet and they were awesome. My only complaint is that the water tastes bad but other than that everything was great and I would recommend stopping in for a tasty meal with good service.

5FLXdkfFwQS9-H5gC4b3wA.text: Duckworth's has a fun, laid back atmosphere! Tons of TVs on the walls. My boyfriend and I ordered the fried pickles and fried banana peppers for appetizers. They were both great - would order again. For my meal, I ordered the Cobb salad and my boyfriend ordered an all-meat pizza and buffalo wings. I've had better Cobb salads, so next time I go I'll try something else. My boyfriend would 100% order the pizza again. Overall, 4/5 stars! Will be back.

T8izuVJTIwVfabzQKa8T3g.text: 3.5 stars, rounded up for excellent service! Went here to grab a late dinner, and was pleased with the large menu selection. I appreciated that they had fresh grilled salmon as an option for the salads. Salmon was cooked right and my meal was good. They also have a large selection of drinks which you can peruse on a fancy iPad bar menu.   Prices were very reasonable, especially for this out-of-Towner who is used to astronomical prices for seafood add-ons. I honestly spent several minutes being like, all these menu items are so reasonably priced! Every employee we interacted with was pleasant, from the hostess to the waitress. Good experience.

qy8nQ-G3JSL3RIuGKdghGw.text: Based on great follow-up service and generosity by Kevin Stevens, the District Manager, I must add back a few stars.  I will most definitely give Duckworth's another shot in the near future, and/or try their sister restaurant, New Concept.  Thanks again, Kevin!

POqusX76u3gMRl8-sDWX4A.text: I can't get enough of this place. Every time I go in I get something different and I still haven't hit the entire menu. And don't get me started on the awesome selection of craft beer. Food and drink here is easily 10/10.   The service is amazing as well. The servers here seem like they love their jobs, they are always smiling and happy to help. To top it off there is always Manager interaction. Last time we were there, Ken came by. Awesome guy, looked super professional and dapper, and was truly interested in our dining experience. I will always go back!

w-GWgKTnDTde3l-IQjgmzw.text: Having been to the Park Rd location many times before, we decided to come here.  Very disappointing experience.  Ok food, horrible service! We asked the waitress if she could check the soda for our second round of drinks, because the soda in our mixed drink was flat, she responded, "I cant help that - it comes out that way out of a gun." Ok then.  Appetizer came out after our burgers were brought to our table. When she brought our food to our table, I asked her about our appetizer and her response was that she was going to bring it out, the only reason she didn't bring it then was because she only had two hands. She missed the whole idea of an appetizer, I guess.    They weren't busy when we were there as there were plenty of empty table. Restaurant looked disheveled.    The ketchup bottle at our table was empty, so we asked our waitress for ketchup and she said she would bring some out.  We waited for about 15 minutes and she didn't come, so we borrowed a ketchup bottle from empty table next to us, it too was empty.  She finally brought some ketchup when we were almost done with our meal.    We ended up taking our appetizer home with us - untouched. We will not return to this location, we were highly disappointed with our visit there.  The Park Rd location will continue to get all of our business.

QBIBuzNp90PZ8VfkKzKO_Q.text: A great selection of craft beers.  The Nachos are the go to, but be warned...this is a meal.  Staff has great knowledge of beer selection.  We dont have small kids, but a child friendly atmosphere.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States

MDumcxBNMu1UEsHZX12H7A.text: Service was very good.  Food was okay.  Middle of our nachos had chewy chicken () Not certain it was cooked all the way.  Things happen.  I will still go back.

photos.caption: Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chicken on our nachos was chewy.  Not sure it was cooked all the way.  But our service was good

ct8sCfIdlLT7HeacI_sFcA.text: Not being my first time here, I was expecting great food as always. I was not disappointed. The server, Becky, was phenomenal. Attentive, funny, energetic; couldn't have asked for better. Now a place of great food and service. Will definitely be heading back for more beer and great food.

9AOTdtNAs3443YU92AJoWw.text: Is you are wanting a great ribeye steak, you need to try this place!!! We order the ribeye cooked on the flat iron grill with a skewer of shrimp.....best freaken meal ever!! We come most every Friday evening and love it!! The staff are so nice and you can't beat the half price bottle of wine!!

NXv9EQjJxL_7JVcON-Hbow.text: This restaurant is a great weekend "where should we eat for dinner?" go-to spot!  They are convenient to our home, they have a great beer selection... everyone working there seems happy to be there and very eager to please... and the food is delicious (my husband tends to gravitate towards wings wherever he goes, and they have great wings here!... I love their salads and fish and chicken dishes)... Last night we went (as we often do) with my in-laws for dinner... my father in law and husband split a pile of wings, my mother in law had the tilapia, and I had a spring salad with salmon.  We were all well cared for... drinks were kept full, extra napkins delivered, etc... the manager on duty stopped by to make sure we were happy... I would go on, but suffice it to say that the food is good, the service is great, and we love that this location is thriving!! PS - there is a great bar area with lots of TVs all over to keep up with sporting events, etc... we've been here for a few other events as well... one of which was a New Year's eve party several years ago... it was a blast!

fYl29CvHfzRPYJ08Qoa7eA.text: Had a very bad experience. Group of friends were having good time and we were told at 9 PM that they can't serve any drinks.  This spoilt our evening and wished we should not have gone there

hq0LHmtVjj-hrW0TjzCK2w.text: Duckworths' is never a let down when I come! Great environment with a lot of TVs to watch your favorite sports teams. We ordered the Buffalo Chicken Nachos and they exceeded expectations! We will forsure be back and love this spot!

_udLbg5jRlCGlZL-YUm0ZA.text: I've been wanting to try this place for a while since it's close to my house. I'd heard about them going to Philly to learn how to make cheesesteaks. I've eaten cheesesteaks in Philly and they have the closest. I had the normal cheesesteak with onions and cheese whiz...aka wiz wit if you know Philly. I'm done eating cheesesteaks unless here.  Our waiter was very attentive and the food came out fast and accurate. The menu has a lot of items on so everyone will find something.   Tons of beer on tap so try something new!

ee57UQTfV5XENP3rdkpZRQ.text: I've been out to a few different Duckworth's locations now and they seem to do a good job at keeping their atmosphere and service above par without being "cookie-cutter" by any means.   I came out to this location after work one day and took advantage of the all drafts $3.50 special. Great place to come out for a few drinks with co-workers, but also looks like a fresh joint for low-key nightlife. I haven't had their food here yet, but assuming it is on the same quality level as the other locations, you won't be disappointed.  Again, the atmosphere and service shine here. TV's all over for good sports coverage on associated game days.

3RmIFD36f88hsqC0xXEBbA.text: Well I was disappointed once again. The food came out wrong as usual and the manager named Charles was not very nice nor accommodating. Being a long time customer of this location I am very sad that they have gone down hill so quickly

4zu4rj3VnoAHHhXzj9pkqQ.text: Our waitress Ashley was great. Very knowledgable about the beers (which is really important here lol) & she's got a great personality. Food was outstanding for a great price too. We just moved to Charlotte TODAY! This was our first dinner here and we will be back!! Thank you Duckworths!

NfsRZ9I7Fj8WeVk4wXtqYg.text: Manager is a bit of a prude. We were getting drinks and then decided to tab is out and call it a night for us. Safe to say I will not be back!

vKKYdT9Xsq5oW_FA5sek9Q.text: My boyfriend and I come almost every week simply because the food is always consistent and good and we always have excellent service. And of course the best beer selection in town !

S1c5UwZ77p-TznWdozVnjw.text: Great beer selection. More tv's than you can shake a stick at, or anything else you want to shake at them. The service I must admit was pretty bad. Our waitress was slow, didn't really seem interested in serving us, but she was a real doll besides that....... Food was masticated with my chewing parts, so I will tell you what I thought. Bleh. Weak even for bar food. If I was more drunk than I was, it may have been decent. Didn't stop me from eating it, but just plain old bleh. The Philly cheese steak was dryer than Cloris Leachman watching an autopsy, and the boneless chicken wings were were about as tasty as my sock. Onion rings and tater tots were pretty good. Skip the food, pound the beer and you'll be ok.

RuhzJ7C1YEXErsJ81OAGNw.text: This place is just okay it is never knocked my socks off on anything I've ever gone there. I will be back because of the subpar selection in Ballantyne for good restaurants with the big selection of beer.

l3RaFmwgyxSYqnwclbQ3vw.text: We were a party of five on a Tuesday night so it was not crowded or noisy.  3 of us had the Tuesday special Cobb salad.  We all agreed it was among the best Cobb salad we had ever had.  The vegetables were fresh and the chicken was tender and juicy, not dried out.  Two others had the pizza and highly enjoyed it!  It was enough for two.  Service was great.  We plan on going again soon!

mQ6zx73tIQ4Y_8QQ0CblvQ.text: Been here multiple times and always have great food. The half rack of ribs was heavenly, albeit messy. The tater tots and to die for. Dip it in the bbq ranch sauce included and watch those tots disappear in minutes. Carolina burger is on the dry side unless you add a sauce provided. I also got a scoffed delivery of my fruity "drink thing".

Photo of Duckworth's Grill & Taphouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. Half rack of ribs with sweet potato and garlic fries.
